Title: Relates to requiring social distancing room configurations in homeless housing
Summary: Requires social distancing room configurations in new homeless housing constructions; provides any individual placed in a hotel, motel or apartment by local social services in response to COVID-19 shall not be permitted to return until such housing has ensured appropriate distancing between beds of at least six-feet.
LawCode: Add Art 2-B ยง53, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring social distancing room configurations in homeless housing
